metadata.name: Unleash Your Inner Sparkle #1/50
metadata.description:
When we moved to Sydney in 2018, I chose our apartment for one reason: the view. It was a photographer's dream.


Sydney is famous for its New Year's Eve fireworks and I knew I had the perfect vantage point. On New Year's Eve in 2019, I shot 104 of images. Each image froze a few seconds of the midnight show, but it didn't capture the magnitude of the experience. 


"Unleash Your Inner Sparkle" is a unique blend of photographs designed to convey the explosiveness of New Year's Eve in Sydney.


Extended Editorial License: Can be used to display privately, or in commercial and non-commercial settings, or in groups with an unlimited number of participants.
